alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:46AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND... MONTOUR...SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING AND NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM EDT... At 746 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Danville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Bloomsburg, Danville, Northumberland, Elysburg, Riverside, Fernville, Mechanicsville, Buckhorn, Jerseytown, Rohrsburg, Iola, Eyers Grove, Exchange, Mooresburg, Stonington, Millville, Snydertown, Washingtonville and Stillwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
